tire_selection_warnings: Application charts are general reference only; verify with airframe manufacturer and tire manufacturer before installing. This is conceptual sizing ONLY, NOT for certification.

tip_back_margin.description: CG is 0.100m forward of main gear (4.7% of wheelbase). Minimum: 3.0%

nose_over_margin.description: CG is 1.215m aft of nose gear. Under 0.4g braking with CG at 1.10m height, critical arm is 0.440m. Margin: 63.8%

explanation: Tricycle configuration provides good forward visibility and ground handling
Fixed gear selected for simplicity, lower cost, and easier maintenance
Single wheel per main leg appropriate for aircraft weight class
Nose load fraction of 16.5% is high; consider geometry changes
All stability margins within acceptable limits
assumptions: Touchdown energy: 2280J (0.5 * 1140kg * 2.0m/s²)
Static load distribution assumes rigid body equilibrium
Dynamic loads use simplified energy-based model (F_avg = E/stroke)
Shock absorber efficiency assumed at 80%
Braking deceleration assumed at 0.4g for nose-over check
Tire sizing is approximate; actual selection requires manufacturer data
